abstract: Lloyd C. Blankfein, head of Goldman Sachs, has had to cope with a soft real estate market like everybody else. He has finally sold his Park Avenue duplex for $12 million to Bryce and Elisabeth Markus, after initially listing it for $15 million
snippet: Lloyd C. Blankfein, head of Goldman Sachs, has had to cope with a soft real estate market like everybody else. He has finally sold his Park Avenue duplex for $12 million to Bryce and Elisabeth Markus, after initially listing it for $15 million
lead_paragraph: Lloyd C. Blankfein, chief executive of Goldman Sachs, has had to cope with a soft real estate market like everybody else. He has finally sold his Park Avenue duplex for $12 million to Bryce and Elisabeth Markus, after initially listing it for $15 million in 2009.
